content.content: message is for maker delegates that are currently handling our governance. You are not doing enough, we need more automated service developments around Maker Dao and we should use a part of the growing surplus buffer to do it. We could have an app with a maker wallet ( like metamask ) where you can trade and swap in dai as the only stable currency ( like argent ). We cannot just sit idle gathering money to only burn or stack up in the surplus buffer. I see our protocol as the premise of a central bank that can create a whole ecosystem depending on it. I personally think you are making a mistake by just increasing the surplus buffer and stopping everything else. I think it should be divided a certain way with burning maybe having only a fifth or less of the budget. Dai pegged to the dollar ( fiat ) loses value everyday you don’t use it and the only thing right to do with it is create new added value. As a lover and investor of maker, I am afraid that without a proper vision and path forward in improving and providing a comprehensive ecosystem to help our DAO thrive and garner attention, we quickly become dinosaurs in the crypto-sphere.
